I was eager for the PvE they promised. I played S1 to S4, bought the battle passes.And then PvE was cancelled. I was so distraught I stopped playing the game from that day. Only downloaded it on steam to tell other people not to play this game. Do not support blizzard in their franchise milking operation. Bobby Kotick's business strategy is not healthy for the long term health of video game IPs and their franchises.
